content.detailedDescription:
my family & were sitting in our front yard on a very nice summer night last year watching the sky and talking. 
we got on the subject of ufos. my kids (emma 6 & molly 8)
asked me if i had ever seen a ufo. i said no but i'd like too. just then my wife says "like those"? i thought she was just being funny. i looked to the west where she was pointing and just like they where on que,2 ufos. a chill went up my back. in all my life i've never seen anything like these 2 diamond or oval shaped objects with an dark red or orangish glow. they were traveling from the west in a side by side formation end to end. they almost appeared to be linked. very close. they were moving very fast. no sound. it was a very clear night and we could see some airliners and small planes nav lights. this was certainly not one of those. they flew right above us and made 5 or 6 very sharp angular turns, still staying tip to tip, until they were heading north. the whole event was maybe 30 seconds and they were out of sight. i've been a star gaizer and sky watcher for a long time (i'm 50) i've been to air shows, seem lots of meteors (i've even seen one hit the ground in kansas. satellites, comets. i'm an aviation buff so i know things that fly. i've never seen anything like these two things. my wife and kids saw the exact same thing. we were all stunned. we talked about it for days. little variation on our sightings. i thought i saw a darker diamond shape or shadow on the bottom of the objects.
very sincerly
mark sisk
content.summary: 2 reddish diamond or oval shaped objects sighted. traveling from the west make 5 or 6 sharp angular turns and head north at night.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was fishing on opeepeesway lake
2.Checking the weather/clouds
3.Unknown
4.The object remained stationary.
5.Uncertain of what i was seeing
6.Looked to check the direction of the boat, when i looked back (within a feuw seconds) the object had vanished.
content.summary: Fat cigar shape, the white color similar to that of the white anamal on a washing machine

content.detailedDescription: although it occured over 25 years ago, i still remember the sighting very clearly.  my brother and i who were 6 and 10 years old, respectively, were in our family room at the end of our house watching television.  it was a tuesday night around 8 pm...I remember that because we were watching "three's company", which aired on abc on tuesdays back then.  for no apparent reason, my brother got up from the sofa during the show and went to the window facing south. he looked out and saw something in the sky above our street.  he told me to come to the window.  i did, just in time to see a circular pattern of orange lights rotating and slowly moving down the street perhaps 200 feet in the air.  we ran to our parents room on the other side of the house to tell them what we had seen.  our mother was very intrigued by the story, but our father was less than enthusiastic and dismissed it as a plane or something else of normal origins.  by the time our mother got to the family room window, the object had floated down the street beyond our line of sight...It was now behind the treeline and gone for what we thought was forever.                                                        i'm not sure if it was the following night or a few nights later, but certainly not very long after the initial sighting, my family was in our parents' bedroom watching television, i'm guessing approximately the same general time of night (8-9 o'clock).  my brother was once again compelled to look out the window, this time to the west toward a pasture behind our back yard.  at the far edge of the pasture, about a quarter mile from our house was a line of pine trees where, hovering just above that, maybe 200 feet in the air, was the same object we had seen previously.  my mother and i sprang from our seats to see the object, this being her first look at it, while my father once more seemed disinterested.  my mother wanted to get a better look at it, so she and i quickly threw on coats and rushed outside to the back fence while my father and brother stayed in the house.                                                          this time we viewed it straight on, so it appeared as a horizontal row of lights.  the object displayed the same orange lights on bottom as before, but it had more colorful lights around its central edge.  i remember the various colors (green, blue, orange) being somehow different from what one might see on a conventional aircraft; not necessarily brighter or duller, but just different, and no blinking either.  it was a chilly night in early march, and the trees hadn't budded out yet, so the canopies were bare of any foliage.  this allowed an almost unobstructed view of the sky above.  my mother and i watched this object with great interest as it simply sat in mid-air making no sound except what my mother describes as a gentle swooshing...I don't recall any sound coming from it myself.  as we peered at this strange sight, my mother and i scanned the sky around us in all directions, where an even stranger thing caught out eyes.  coming across the sky from four different directions were four tiny, solid, unblinking balls of red light approaching the object simultaneously.  we watched as these things steadily approached the larger "ship" at an altitude about a hundred feet above it.  they converged to a point just above its center and, one by one, each descended into the top of the larger object.  as soon as this process was completed, the object seemed to activate itself by turning on two larger, brighter lights, almost like spotlights.  these lights criss-crossed a couple times before finally turning off.  soon afterward the object began to move away from us gradually until it retreated beyond the treeline and out of sight. my mother and i turned around and walked back into the house, never to be the same.                                                           we never saw the object again after that night, although that's not to say it didn't ever return, as it very well could have.  the experience left my mother and me with a profound belief in extraterrestrial life and visitation.  neither of us expressed any fear during the encounter, but rather a great fascination and excitement. my mother and i do not believe we were abducted, but we are both dead certain even after all these years that the object was not anything of this world.  it didn't exhibit any behavior characteristic of man-made aircraft, and although it could understandably be confused with perhaps a blimp by someone less observant, we know that it definitely wasn't that...At the time, goodyear had a blimp base just 20 miles south of conroe, so we had seen blimps flying on numerous occasions at night.  there was absolutely no mistaking one for the other.  it is one of only a few experiences my mother and i shared which we have continued to discuss many times since, and we both consider ourselves very fortunate to have had the opportunity to witness something this extraordinary...We will always cherish the memory of that night.  and after going to see "close encounters of the third kind" later that year, my father deeply regrets that he chose not to go out that night to see the object with us for himself.  as it was back in 1978, before the technology became affordable, we had no way of videotaping the experience, and the only camera we had at the time was a cheap one incapable of nighttime photography.  we have only our memories of the event to rely on now, but maybe that's all we really need, for as long as we believe with all our hearts that what we saw is something rare and special and genuine, physical proof isn't really that vital.  of course it would have been nice to have something to show others what we saw to establish crediblity, but that's impossible under the circumstances.  whether anyone else believes our story or not, we know it actually happened, and i feel that's what truly matters.
content.summary: My mother and i noticed a circular pattern of colored lights floating above the treeline behind our back yard.  it remained stationary for about a half hour where it was accompanied by four smaller red balls of light that approached it from different dir

content.detailedDescription:
Speaking to a friend from one vehicle to another. as my friend spoke. i'd divert my eyes away, reflecting on was said. first, i thought  the stars were moving, but as my eyes adjusted, i noticed just two were moving. i thought it might be a jet or some other aircraft and i was waiting for the report from the engines. where my friend and i were was a very remote part of an already remote state, weeks island. no available ambient noise, none, truck engines off, no sound. the two lights traveled very slow from north to south in what i could tell was a perfect arc but slightly canted to the east, about eleven o'clock. at the apex of arc, object stopped and i observed clearly that these lights were on one object. slowly these lghts began to fade in light intensity until they were indistingushable from other stars.  finally, i think, they faded to black. the only movement i made was to get out of the my vehicle at the first movement over the trees. the whole event took about three minutes, five tops. 
can you tell me what i saw that night?
ps the lights were positioned in a staggered kind of arrangement, like military aircraft do, one forward, toward the east, the other aft, toward the west. no sound!
content.summary: Observed odd moving, soundless lights in night sky that, when were overhead, stopped and shortly afterward faded until indistinguishable from other stars. this was two distinct lights in a staggered formation, but moved as one body. absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch with my wife and her sister.  we had been watching the news about princess di's death.  we went outside to say goodnight when i felt the urge to look up.  all of us saw four small dim lights on a 45-degree angle (approximately), traveling at a very high rate of speed going north to south.  there was no sound at all.  it took less than three seconds or so to travel out of our sight.  i am quite up to date on current military aircraft.  it is my opinion that this was a test aircraft of some sort.  however at that rate of speed it would have been going faster than mach 10.  guessing that it was flying between 10,000 and 70,000 feet above sea level this is a conservative estimate on its speed.  i have never seen a satellite travel even close to this rate of speed and given the fact that they are hundreds of miles up this is the best educated guess i can come up with as to its altitude and speed.
content.summary: Four dim lights travel at very high speed north to south.

content.detailedDescription: We were standing on the corner of henderson highway and hespeler in a lot that has a couple of basketball hoops set up.My friend's little girl was laying on a cement wall beside the basketball court looking up at the sky when she noticed something unusual in the sky and asked her father what it was.All three of us were standing there pointing up in the sky at this object that we first thought was a bird. a bird usually circles and rides the updrafts when up high.This was very high up since it appeared to be just under the clouds.It was not moving ,just sitting there blinking.It was at this time that we realized we were looking at a ufo.This blinking light then started moving in a northeasterly direction towards a jet's exhaust stream when all of a sudden another one of these blinking lights popped out of the clouds and started moving towards the other blinking light.When the lights were right besides each other they popped back into the clouds right beside the jet exhaust.We thought they were gone so we turned to leave when all of a sudden something caught my peripheral vision to right of me and i saw a craft drop from the sky at a phenomenal rate of speed and then decelerate to hide behind some trees .We observed the silouette of this craft through the trees as it glided to the right of the trees towards an opening where it stopped and hovered.I think that this craft attempted to sneak up on us but we just happened to spot it dropping from the sky and glide behind the trees.I was scared shitless when i saw the silouette of this craft through the trees,i have been a ufo buff since a child and here i was watching a ufo gliding behind some trees attempting to be sneaky.This may sound like total bullshit to the public ,but it happened and i am willing to take a lie detector test or any other test to prove what we three witnessed. when this craft stopped in the clearing above some houses just feet away from traffic i knew that we were looking at the same type of craft that i have seen on unexplained mysteries .It is so hard to write this without feeling that i may meet with ridicule but i have two other witnesses who experienced exactly what i did and are willing to undergo any lie detector/hypnosis to prove what we saw in broad daylight in the city of winnipeg.The craft that appeared in front of us hovered for what seemed like a few seconds and disappeared in a flash of bright light.As this thing hung in the air everyting around me seemed to come to a stop. dont remember hearing the sound of the traffic which was right next to me until the bright light that was being emitted fromm this craft as it hovered dissipated.One minute this thing was hanging in the air  above the houses and then everything around me got very bright and then just as quickly this craft was gone in a flash.One second we wer looking at this object and then it was gone.This is totally fucking mindblowing.Excuse my language ,but i don't know if i will feel normal again.After we witnessed  whatever /whomever we saw ,we left the area and crossed the street pushing our bikes until we got across the street.I asked my friend what time it was as we rode along and he replied that it was seven fourty-eight.We were in this lot for thirty-six minutes,it was only a couple of minutes from the time that we saw the blinking lights till one dropped out of the sky at a phenomenal rate of speed and then stop on a dime behind some trees.We feel that there was some time lost that we cannot explain.We could not have been standing in that lot for a half an hour staring at this craft without someone else noticing.What has happened here.Are these entities able to somehow control time.Any further questions regarding this incident if it is taken seriously can be answered by calling my cell phone.There are three of us who witnessed what i have described here and all of us will willingly undergo any type of lie detector test and beat it hands down/even undergo hypnosis to uncover anything that may lie in the subconscious regarding this true sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My self and two witnesses saw a blinking light sitting just underneath the clouds.Another blinking light popped out of the clouds.Both started moving in north easterly direction and then popped back into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished put brakes on my truck and was putting my ramps away in my back yard. my house faces east so i was walking to the west. i live just a few miles east of dm air force base and i enjoy watching the planes fly over, so when i'm outside i always watch the sky. when i got to the back yard i put the ramps down and looked up out of habit. i saw 2 small objects off in the distance coming toward me so i stopped to watch them. i've always loved aircraft and can id just about anything in the air from the hellcat to the raptor. as they got closer i realized they were round and had no wings or roters. they were moving slow like a helocopter but with no sound. one was very clearly not from the base. it was flying at about 500 ft in a straight line traveling from w.N.W. to e.S.E. the second object was either much smaller or higher up like maybe 1000 ft traveling with the first one. as i watched they both passed directly over head. when they did i could see that both were round and looked like polished steel. then both objects stopped dead and shot up and away back the way they came. it took about 10 to 15 minutes to get to me and less than a second to disappear from sight. the larger or lower one was the only one i really saw shoot back to the west. the smaller one just seemed to vanish in place. i can only assume it followed the other one. i didn't report this sooner because i wasn't sure of what i'd seen, that was until last night 8-1-2005. i was standing looking out my back door watching a storm coming in. it was about 8:30 pm and i saw two lights traveling at high speed one behind the other just north of my house. i walked to my side yard to watch them to see what they were. i thought they were both air force jets because i could hear the engine noise. then all of the sudden the front one made what looked like a 90* square right turn south. it's flight path was well east of my house. the one following it made a sweeping turn that took it almost right over my head. when it did i could see it was an a-10 flying at about 300 ft. the a-10 got back in behind the first object and a few seconds later the first object shot straight up out of sight. the a-10 started up after it but then turned out heading west back toward the base. i know the second light was an a-10 but the first one was what looked like what i had seen in may except it looked as if it were made of light.
content.summary: Two disc shaped objects traveling west to east passed over my house then shot away back to the west.

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine and his little girl of nine years were standing on the corner of henderson highway and hespeler in winnipeg manitoba on july 25/2005 at seven ten p.M. there are basketball hoops located on this corner and cement walls around adjacent to the hoops.My friends little girl named shelby was watching the sky when she asked us what she was looking at up in the sky.When we looked up into the sky there was a cloud cover above us with what at first seemed to be a bird flying at high altitude just beneath the clouds.As we observed this object we noticed that it was blinking and remaining stationary.The object then started moving in the in a north easterly direction when all of a sudden another blinking light popped out of the clouds and caught up to the other blinking light and together they flew  into the clouds above them.The reason i am reporting this is because of what happened next.After they flew into the clouds we turned to leave the lot we were observing this phenomena from.As we turned to leave something caught my peripheral vision and i turned quickly towards this while pointing at and yelling at my friend and his daughter.There was a silouette of a craft gliding behind the trees and it glided right into an opening in the trees . i am still freaking out about we saw in the clearing. there was a ufo hovering above some houses observing my friend , myself and his child.We are still not sure how long this craft hovered in front of us or whether any other citizens of winnipeg witnessed what we did .The corner where occurred is one of the busiest areas of the city.This is located right at the foot of the disraeli freeway,so my frind and i have discussing this since it happened.As we were observing this craft right in front of us it suddenly got very bright and the craft was gone in the blink of an eye.My friend, myself, and his child then proceeded to leave this area and headed for home.As we were riding our bikes away from this event i asked my friend what time it was and he answered seven fourty eight.We were standing there observing this thing for thirty six minutes.From the time that we stood there and pointed at this object till the the time that it shot down from the sky and attempted to hide behind the trees,only about two or three minutes elapsed.This would have made the sighting of the craft in the clearing at approx. seven thirteen p.M. since i walked onto the lot at seven ten p.M.This all happened very quickly yet seemed to take a long time. we were feeling very disoriented as we headed for home. i am willing to take any lie detector test to prove what i experienced was real.So are my friend and his daughter. we are quite sure that what we experienced was quite real because we all describe the same saucer shaped object with a bottom that is sort of shaped light a chestnut.This craft hovered over some houses in one the busiest intersection in winnipeg so i cannot believe that we were the only witnesses,at least i hope we are not.What the hell is going  on . we were about two hundred feet from this craft as it hovered over the houses.Went back to this location to study our vantage point when we sighted this craft over these houses.It would be impossible for the whole neighborhood not to see something like this.Our question is why didn't anybody else notice what should have been front page news. i have not been feeling normal since this happened on july 28/2005 -seven ten p.M.
content.summary: Myself,a friend and his daughter witnessed two blinking lights in the sky,which flew into the clouds.One of these craft shot to earth at a high rate of speed and attempted to conceal itself among the trees.We all saw it when appeared in a clearing .

content.detailedDescription: It was 2 in the morning,on the deerfield beach pier,i was fishing and i looked to my left whitch is north and i saw this object comming toward me and what was unusual was is was totally silent and no lights were anywhere on the object,it made a wooshing ,almost like wind sound,had no idea what it was but knew it was very stange,it was about 70 feet above my head and it was going north to south along the coast of the beach.I cant exactly describe it but it was like a triangular,box like all back,it was night though.And made a noise as it passed overhead and the only thing i can describe as shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh and floated right passed me.There was an old black lady who was next to me and i said holy shit did you see that,i couldnt explain the feeling i had like i was in total disbelief,shock and amazmentshe looked at me and made the strangest laugh.Like i was crazy.And at the same time she knew i was right like this wasnt her first time,i saw it just float south down the coast and that was it.I told everyone i knew and everyone thought i was nuts,but dammit i know what i saw.It still is with me today,even the feelin i had that night.
content.summary: Watched ufo come frome the north and head south

content.detailedDescription: In the front yard of my home at the time, we were outside looking at a new car a friend had purchased.  there were six of us outside just chatting at the time, when my daughter said, "what's that in the sky"?  we saw what looked like a extremely bright star.  but, soon we realized that it was dropping lower and lower in the sky.  as we watched it, the light "fluttered".  i'm not sure of what term to use, but it seemed like the like moved.. a sheet of light, like a page turning in a book eminated from the light.  it was a series of flashes only lasting  a moment, then it seemed to remain a solid light after that.  until it dropped below our line of sight behind a construction company rock pile across the street.  my daughter and i jumped in the car to get another look, but never found it again.  i don't claim anything about this, other than it was an odd way for any light to behave, and i've never seen anything like it before or since.  i have a public job as a radio announcer in a small town, so i would appreciate this not being used in association with my name.  therefore, i have not offered my address, or phone number.  but, i have offered my email if for some reason you have questions.  thank you.
content.summary: A light in the sky appears and "flashes" and then drops below our line of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I lived in the sea gate section of brooklyn, new york which is a private community at the end of coney island.  i was going to get ready for work.  i was sitting up in bed having my coffee at 6:45 am,(my bedroom was on the 2nd floor of a 2-family house and in the front of the apartment.) i was looking across the street at my neighbor's house, which belonged to jackie parascondola and his family. something caught my eye.  it was exactly directly in my full field of vision.  i called my mother to see it and she was amazed too.  (she is now deceased and cannot corroborate my accounting of this incident).  i ran to get my 8mm kodak movie camera, but it lacked film.  the object was approximately 30' above the roof directly dead-center over jackie's house.  it looked like a small water tower (oval-shaped top and 4 legs descending from the top).  it was light tan or beige.  it stood absolutely still and suspended in mid-air. it didn't go sideways, tilt or turn around or upside down. no lights, no sound - just suspended and quiet.  we watched it for about 10 solid minutes.  it stayed there about 5 minutes doing nothing in direct line of my gaze.  all of a sudden it started to move straight up in a direct line about 30 feet, slowly and in complete silence.  it came back down to the original height over the house and then moved in a straight line directly to its right about another 30 feet.  it went back to the original position for a few moments and then went left.  it went behind the trees on the block and we couldn't see it anymore because the sun was rising from the east, which completely obliterated our view.  it moved slowly and steadily and in complete silence.  it was a mechanical object that seemed to be made of metal.  it appeared to us to be controlled because of its measured movements.  it never went fast.  always at the same rate of speed.  to this day, every time i see a water tower, while driving, i think of that object.  the object was maybe 5 feet in height and about 2-3 feet wide.  it was longer than it was wide.  i have always wanted to report this and now,  42 years later, it is still clearly visualized and remembered by me. i can draw a picture and i can even go back to the house and take a digital photo and sketch what i saw, if requested. anyone have a similiar experience?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw object hovering over neighbor's house early in the morning.  no lights/no sound.  absolutely silent and suspended in mid-air.

content.detailedDescription:
Narrative from william puckett's report from "ufo's northwest"
description (in witness's own words): my fianc���e and i were both driving separate cars were just driving home from a dinner at the folk���s house. on our usual way home, we both noticed an extremely fast moving object moving from the north to the south across the road we were on. my fianc���e called me on my cell phone to verify what we saw than we got off the phone. we turned down a small road with no street lights going from the north to the south towards our home when we both noticed at our red light stopped an astronomical sized object just hovering literally right above our cars with beaming "stadium lights" shooting down at the road. i looked in the rear view mirror and suddenly it was gone. we both got on the cell phone again to verify what we saw. we looked on your website and found that their was another sighting just three weeks ago here in sarasota, florida on may 29, 2005. seems very weird to us two sightings in such a small amount of time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large round object with "stadium lights" flies over cars

content.detailedDescription: 1.Outside my house looking at mars 2.It was nerey low 3.A top secret airplane or a ufo 4. it was triangular it had three lites on it and it just went striaght and had no sound 5.I just stoud there looking at the object 6.It just wet straight and i went in side
content.summary: Slow trangular object no sound

content.detailedDescription:
1.One evening while leaving band practice, my co-band member and i noticed huge, i mean huge space ship hovering above the woodlawn cemetery in baltimore, maryland.  
     2.What made us notice the object was the enormous size of the space craft, and that it was just hovering over the cemetery.  
     3.When i first saw the object i thought it was a huge space ship.
     4.The object was shaped very similar to the saucer part of the star ship enterprise on the new generation series.  only the saucer part, not that other space garbage they put on the enterprise that looked like "discovery" booster rockets.  it didn't need none of that crap.
     it was dark metalic like color with tiny lights all around and underneath.  it appeared to have a few lights that were extended off of the bottom surface of the craft.     
     it was huge man!  it seem to be just as large as the grave yard, but it was hovering above it.  it was making a low frequency sound like.....Jshr...Jshr....Just hovering.
     5.  when my friend and i saw the space ship, we pulled over next to the grave yard.  i asked jay if he was seeing the same thing that i was seeing and he said yea.  we were talking about how huge it was and the jshr motor sound it was emitting. we also talked about why it was over woodlawn cemetery like that..You know...What was it really doing other than hovering.  when it left we jumped with excitement because neither of us has ever seen anything leave and travel so fast before.....Did i mention that it was huge?  after it left we agreed not to tell anyone....Well it was 1981!  we did tell the band though.
     6. it left at a speed so fast that my eyes could barely keep up with it.  it never changed sounds, it just "zipped" away.  i guess the sound it made when it left could be compared to the sound of a bullet whizzing.
     it left in a "z" pattern. not a lot of z's, but like one big z and it was back with the stars.

    comment:  the followint year i was employed by the nsa (national security agency).  i thought it perculiar when i saw a question which read.."have you ever seen a ufo or have ever been abducted by an alien?"  i answered "no".  i was not going to be the one!
content.summary: My friend and i got out of the car to see a huge ufo hovering over a graveyard!

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas walking south on oak ave between 23rd and 24th street 
as an object caught my eye . i told my friends to take a 
look but took off running after some girl that were walk ing on the cross street . the object was moving to fast to 
be a fighter jet . it was silver in color and looked like 
a rocket without fins . no smoke ,fire or con trail . 

   what did i think ? after all these years i still don't know what to think . at that point of time in our history 
the military had nothing that could move that fast . 

   the object was silver-gray , no wings or fins  . it moved
 at a 45 degree angle and kept going up & up & up . i watched it go completely out of sight . 

   i was in awe of the speed i was affraid it would come back . i told all my friends that were with me and they all said i was nuts . i know what i saw and i beleive i saw a
ufo .  

     i called langley field afb , a major came by to take a 
statement after i had told what i had seen , he wrote down 
what i had said and off he went . i even remember the car 
the officer was driving ,a ford fairlane air froce blue . 

      redstone arsinal isnn't far from where i live i called
there to see if they had shot up any rockets that day .No.
redstone was east of my location the object came from the west heading east-south east away from redstone .Langley 
field was north-east from where i lived . these two location
were not even close to where the object was comming from .

     for a long time every one of my friends called me spaceman .
content.summary: Sliver-gray rocket with no fins

content.detailedDescription: The wife and i were seeing our company to their car in front of our house, it was a real clear night i could see off to the west what i thought was an airplane white light it was heading towards what looked like a fairly bright star and i thought to myself if that star was another airplane they would crash and to my suprise the airplane light did not pass by the star. it was then that i brought it to everyones attention, after a minute or two it came out the other side and i hollerd to everybody again to look, it came out a little ways it did a half circle around the star and went back into it, i asked everyone if they had seen it? the only one was my wife she said she saw it come out and go half way around and go back inside, we then went and got our binoculars but through the binoculars it looked like a star with red,blue glittering. our company left and i went to my back yard were it's a little darker but nothing happened the hour i was back there, i also judged the movement with the other stars an it appered to move at the same pace, i then tired and went back inside hoping to hear on the news if someone else had seen it.
content.summary: Starlike object moved toward another starlike object and stopped in it, after a few moments it came out the other side did a half circle around it and went back into it.

content.detailedDescription: Ok i had just gotten off work on perdido key and was driving across the bridge that spans the intra-coastal waterway, traveling north off the key headed home. there was a very impressive cummulonimbus cloud off to the northeast and i was admiring its beauty as traffic was kinda backed up on the bridge as it is that time of day... well i noticed almost in the center of the cloud which was probably 5 to 10 miles away maybe further, at the edge facing my point of view... in other words there was cloud behind the anomoly..., was a very shiny object or reflection. i gaze at the clouds all the time and have never seen clouds do this. anyway like i said it was shiny and judging the distance it had to be like say a football field across kinda blob shaped. it was hard to tell shape as the background was almost the same color. but it was reflecting light in such a manner that i dont think it was part of the cloud. you know like a sundog type effect. i suppose it could have been natural sunlight reflecting off the cloud but i've never seen that phenomena before. anyway it slowly dimmed maybe like if it was an object that it was moving further into the thunderstorm. thats not all... when i got to the top of the bridge i took my eyes off it to make sure i wasnt going to run into the car in front of me. when i looked back over at the object its like the whole area around it "shifted" for a split second. thats the best way i can describe it..After that the object slowly got absorbed by the cloud. i had polarized sun glasses on so the detail of the event was very good. virtualy no glare. the shifting effect could have been cloud to cloud lightning i suppose but it was a bright sunny day and you rarely see c to c lightning in the day. well thats pretty much it... oh a couple days later one of my co workers and i were talking and i brought it up and he said that he had seen the same thing that day (he was about five min. ahead of me) so the phenom. lasted a while aparently. and caught his attention too... well was it natural phenom or substantial object?? i dont know.
content.summary: Very shiny object seen near thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription:
Myself, my wife, daughter and my daughters boyfriend were traveling to the dallas area to see the breeders cup horse race.  my wife never sees shooting stars.  as we entered the edge of town we both saw what we thought was a shooting star moving from left to right across the sky in front of us.  my wife began exclaiming  -- ooh ooh ooh and pointing at it.  when the streak of light got in front of us, it slowed down to almost stopped and slowly moved over the town. when it slowed down, we could see that it was actually three lights mounted on a triangle shaped object.  we were close enough that i could see a bit of bronze color on the fuselage between the lights.  my wife continued to point and ooh and while we watched, the object simply disappeared.  my wife then actually slapped me quit hard saying -- did you see that?  

i did have the mental faculty to answer her slowly by saying.  -- yeah i know what i saw, but i want you to say what you saw so i can compare.  she described exactly what i saw.

it was a particularly disturbing dissappearance because the moon was quite bright and the lights from the town and a softball field(?) made certain cloud formations behind the object very visible when the object disappeared.
unfortunately the kids in the back seat did not see it. 

 just guessing, i would say that it was about 1500 ft or less in altitude.  as we drove on, i became quite bothered because i can find no explanation for what i saw.  i am a very critical thinker and can come up with nothing.  i considered that a reflection from behind was refracting in the windshield, but my wife's pointing finger on the glass and the fact that it was viewed through both the windshield and side window ruled out that possibility in my mind.  as i said, the disappearance moment was very dramatic.  it was not as quick as a light turning off, but it was quick enough that i saw no fade.  i replayed the event over and over in my mind and cannot explain it.  i submitted this sighting on  some other site shortly afterward, but the discovery channel reminded me of mufon.  i believe that this is a true sighting (i have had others that i would not  call reliable) and want to report it to a true reasearch group.
content.summary: Shooting star with brakes and 3 lights

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were returning from the casino on mission road. we were driving south when we noticed a bright white light coming around the side of a mountain. at first, we thought it was a small plane going down. it stopped suddenly and then turned and returned between two hills.  the lights stopped and a red light came up from the hillside and joined the white lights.  it appeared to vanish. the lights reappeared about 100 yards further south of us and a red light came up from the ground and entered the white lights.  the lights then again seemed to vanish.  two other people stopped on the road and the man asked if we saw that?  there was absolutely no sound. even the dogs and cattle were perfectly quiet.  two jets came streaking into the area, circled where the lights had been and then returned from the direction in which they came. (davis montham airbase is located in tucson).  we reported this at one time, but i don't know if it was with you.  we discussed this on the remainder of the trip home.  my husband is a quality engineer, i am a nurse. we both think clearly and precisely and objectively.  we agree that the light appearance (from center to outside) appeared as if "doors" were opening. we wonder if we hadn't witnessed a "loading dock" affect.  the colored orbs came up from the indian reservation. the man who stopped with us said his indian grandfather had told him stories for years about the "sky lights" but this was the first he had ever witnessed.  i still to this day (four years later) think about the strange lights and the actions. what sticks with me the most is the total lack of sound; on the ground or in the air.  it was extremely strange.
content.summary: A series of white lights joined by one red light and then one green light going from ground to white lights in air

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car (passenger) driving on highway 91 east coming from corona ca going back to riverside ca, when looking out the window i saw this bright green orb like light in the sky arching down towards the ground...I thought to myself "its going to hit the ground" where there were house and such but before that happened it just vanished as quickly as it appeared. at first it looked like it was a green flare but it was not a "fiery" kind of light this was a steady bright light all the way to the point when it vanished. my reaction was more along the lines of "wow what the hell is that?!". again this was very fast and only lasted about 3-4 sec.
content.summary: Green orb (light)

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 11:00 p.M. i was driving my car to home in dayton, nv. it was a friday night. i am not sure what the date was other than the year and month. it was april of 1996. this is a real true encounter and i do not wish to be known. it has been actually a hard thing for me to deal with in my life.
     i was actually going to go home to grab my guitar. i was a 25 year old guitar virtuoso. my indian friend from the hopi tribe in town was waiting for me to come back. i was a kid, just trying to have some fun on a friday night. so now i am going to put into perspective the events that happened, true and factual. i will have you know straight forward that this story is complete and true. i will send drawn pictures soon.
     so i was driving in my dodge rampage on hwy. 50 east in moundhouse nevada. my window was down. the air was blowing on my face. i had my radio tuned in and up fairly loud. my speakers sucked with some distortion, but it was cool with me. i was on my way home to grab my guitar at 11:00 at night. i was intending to get there as fast as possible cause i wanted to create some music with my friend chris, the indian.
so it was already late and i knew i had to hurry. i had nothing else to do. 
     i passed the virginia city turn off on the left. as i passed it i noticed some light on the hills at the mouth of the canyon there. there were 4 lights. they were a whitish blue and very very bright. they were lighting up the sagebrush actually on the hillside on the west side of the vc highway. they were about 50 to 100 feet off the ground. i was driving so, i saw the lights but i looked away as i was driving. i was thinking to myself thats a low jet. i thought it was a jet plane coming from reno. i looked back at them. they were still in the same spot some 30 seconds later. then i began to wonder. what the heck is that. must be a helecopter i thought. then i really began to stare. no it's not a helecopter. i knew it was no helecopter or plane. yet, i could see no object, only lights. they were not moving. i could see the brush on the hill bright as day. i saw some things moving in the brush. little objects scurrying about very quick like that of coyote's or something. my heart began to thump. the adrenaline kicked in as i realized this was something different than that i'd ever seen.
     i was driving still and slowed down so i could see more of it. i was very realized and already had a hunch it was a ufo. i said out loud, "haha yeah you know i can see you." as soon as i said this, the lights began to turn. they were no longer shining on the brush. they span approximately 100 yards apart with 2 on top about 30 yards apart and the lower ones at the sides about 100 yards apart. they looked like the lights in a stadium kind of. they were very big and bright. there were no other cars behind me i could see lights from nor in front of me. 
     my heart was racing fast. i was frightened. i no longer was really watching the road. the lights had my total attention. they turned around and began slowly hovering down the canyon towards the highway i was driving on. there were then smaller lights below the larger ones that were blinking in succesion around and repeated. thats when i realized it was a round object. i was freaking out. my eyes were huge i'm sure and i was awake and ready to notice every detail. the lights came closer down the canyon as if to head me off at the pass. like direct coordinates at my speed to meet me at a certain point ahead. i knew i was heading straight towards them at the same time. i was afraid, yet i was curious. 
     so i kept driving and looking as they became larger and closer. i was amazed. entranced by the realization and curiousity i barely even looked at the road ahead. i was just staring out my downed window. my radio became all fuzzy and then was silent.
my car was driving fine. 
     soon there became an embankment on the side of the highway that separated the lights from my vision. i knew from driving the highway many times that the embankment recedes as you approach dayton hill where the canyon is. i also knew the thing was moving down the canyon at the same speed i was. the suspense was incredible.
     i came to the hill and as soon as the embankment receded, there i saw something that i will never forget for the rest of my life. i was at top the hill and the canyon beside me on the left. right there as the ground cleared way, i was gazing into the middle of a set of windows! yes, this was real. i was not even watching the road. i was mezmerized by the depth. i was staring straight into a spacecraft from another world. it was indeed a saucer. yes, there were long windows draping all the way across and around. i saw the tiers or stories, the floors. i saw the walls. everything inside was white.
     this was incredibly astounding. i had no clue what to think or anything. all i could do was stare and observe.It was like i was above it and as i went down the hill i became level with it.
     on the left bottom story in the windows were aliens that i first saw. there was a female. they all were wearing white robes. she had a bracelet and a necklace on, that of gold or silver and makeup like blush on her cheeks. her arm was on the shoulder of a younger one, a boy and they were looking right at me. right into my eyes they were. she nudged herself to him and spoke to the other younger children along the window maybe 10 or so more. they were all smaller like a 5 year old. she was talking to the older boy and them without speaking! and me! i felt a joyful feeling inside as they gazed into my eyes and she then smiled and pointed at me as to show them that i understood her and them. her long finger, their faces grey. she had 3 fingers and a thumb.
     i then had a terrible feeling. i looked up to the second story. there was 2 beings there in the middle of the room. i was about level with them i think. the being i first saw had a long draped back skull like that of the movie alien kinda but the face any eyes of e.T. his skin was chocolate brown and he too was wearing a white robe. his skull was maybe 2 feet long behind his head draping down. his face looked a lot like e.T. the kids faces below looked like the alien pictures you often see yet their eyes weren't black. their eyes were shaped like the pictures but they were white with irises. blue eyes, the girl had green eyes.
     the one with the draped skull on the second story was standing and holding a clipboard against himself in his white robe. i noticed all that stuff as he noticed me. his mouth dropped! his eyes bulged! as he realized i was looking at him and them and he was staring straight into my eyes! he was frightened that i saw him. it was deffinately not part of his plan. his eyes were white with huge blue irises and pupils. i'd estimate i was 20 feet from his face.
     i made contact alright. he immediately turned to the other one in the room in front of him. the one in front of him was sitting. i saw the side view of him but only his head at the time. he had a human like head. not a draped skull. i could see wrinkles all over his head. it made him look very old. no hair on any of them whatsoever.
     he was not in white. he was wearing a black suit from what i could see. he turned his face toward me! right after the one with the clipboard looked at him after seeing me! he turned his face toward me. ohhhh myyyy goddd was i scared!!!! he was so so so so so old looking it sent shivers all over me. his face was all wrinkled and old and his eyes all beady! they were pure black. as he and i stared eachother in the eyes i realized he was a man. he was a human. he must've been thousands of years old and very wicked. i was petrified. i was scared shitless. he gave me this snarling look yet at the same time i could see his smarts. there was some kind of bigscreen in front of him blinking at the outer rim of the windows edge at the end of the ship windows on his floor. he then looking at me directly, raised his hand up with a very long finger and smiled or smirked as he hit a button on some kind of panel in front of him.
     instantly! the windows covered themselves with a fanlike shell that was that like of ripples like of a chinese fan decending from the top. corrogated riffles about 1 foot high each decending from the top to the middle. they were breathing like and sparkling with colors. i noticed that they were very sharp looking like razor blades all on the top along the riffles.They could cut through anything!
     the bottom sealed up and began blinking lights around in succession. that must be how they do their airports. that must be their laws or regulations i thought.
then it began to spin. my window was still down and i was close to the bottom of the hill as i heard the riffles begin to hummmm! they sounded like they were some kind of giant fan blades. the object tilted at about a 45 degree angle. as it spun faster and faster i could only see the outline of it. like it was suddenly cloaked. kinda like a rim on a car as it spins. it spun so fast it began to become invisible. it then shot up into the sky leaving a small white trail behind for a split second.
     i was petrified. i had reached the bottom of the hill and pulled over. i had to look through my rear view mirror to switch lanes from traffic. i pulled over and got out of my car. i looked up. i wanted to see it more. it was sunny outside. there were cars going by. it only takes 3 minutes to get down the hill. i was at the top at 11:00 p.M. and the bottom around 8:30 or something. yet, i didn't even realize this. not at all. i had no conception of time. i was tired. i went home and crashed out. i woke up and remembered the hill. i don't know how it was daylight when i got to the bottom of a 3 minute hill at 11:00. i don't remember anything between that time accept for driving down the hill. i have only told a handfull of people this story.
there's more to it as well in the day and the months that followed. i will tell more if i get a chance. i want to send sketches so i will begin the drawings from memory tonight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Gazing right inside and making eye contact......Lost time.

content.detailedDescription:
Around dusk...The electrician and my older brother then around 11 or 12 ran in the house, my brother told my mom who was then washing dishes..Mom!! mom!! theres a flying saucer out side..Theres a flying saucer out side!!! my mom said "your crazy".. the electrician said "lady, if thats not a flying saucer, then its a round plane".. 
i then along with 2 of my sisters ran to the storm window in the living room, nelt down and looked up to see a silver disk in the sky...With multi colored lights going round the disk but in no curtain direction..With no noise from the craft... i remember thinking to myself as a child, how is this spining in the sky but not going zig zag as a top would do if you spin it??  the craft just moved in a straight line.. i followed it with my eyes as long as i could until it passed in the direction over my house...I never forgot what happened there and remember as a child when i used to go out side the house and play basketball, i would look over in the woods and thing what if they landed there??? and i would get my ball and run back in the house...
writting this right now makes me really realize that i as a child had nothing to gain by going through this or remembering this but you know what?? i still dont want anything, its just the truth.
i would like to know if there was anyone in johnston, r.I. that saw the same .
thank you 
gary
p.S.
i hope this isnt some goverment mis information sight... just to make everyone think where fruitcakes but 75% of what we see on tv is fruitcake stuff...  : )
content.summary: Johnston, r.I. (i along with others say flying silver disk)

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the bus stop at about 8:30 in the morning, going to work at the block of 7300 se 11 (this has nothing to do with flying saucers or little green people, by the way). ahead of me i noticed what appeared to be a purplish, very bright light about six feet above the ground, about the size of a baseball, two hundred feet away. i measured this distance when i got back from work. anyway, my first reaction was to lower my glasses, thinking it was some kind of refraction. the purplish ball did not move. i stopped, interested but not worried. the ball went from hovering to incredible speed, passing over my left shoulder within a few feet within a second. i can't estimate the speed, so fast. i actually ducked within a second after it has passed. i then looked up but could not see it. i looked around to see if anyone else possibly could have seen this. two men were loading a sofa into a pickup about a half-block back, but they were oblivious, busy. i know this sounds crazy, but it happened. again, no saucer, no green people, but this was real.
content.summary: Purplish ball of light hovering then moving at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription:
I saw an object while i was watching sundays spacewalk. the object went from the bottom to the top of the nasa tv picture. right side of picture behind noguchi as he was placing the inop gyro into the shuttle cargo bay. at approx 03:44 pdt or around 2 hours 4 +- 2or3min into the space walk. a small dark object visible for only 2-3 seconds. from the angle of the camera at the time the thing must have been going in the same direction as the shuttle. no way to tell range. if i hadn't been watching closely i would have missed it. didn't look like a digital video artifact. sure wish i had taped the walk.
 
maholo...Rob
content.summary: Nasa tv sts114 spacewalk

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my bedroom in the house i used to live in (still in the same town as i am now)and i was sitting in bed watching tv.Ched it
2. it literally filled the window directly infront of my bed.
3. i didn't know, i was in awe as i watched it
4. it was just slowly flying to the right (so, north), it was like two giant solid incredible bright triangles. attached is a sketch. it appeared flying horizontal, not in the sky, like if you take your arm, extend it out and turn your hand up so your hand is vertical.
5. i was astonished, i didnt know what it was, after a good 30ish seconds, i reached for a camera i had on a boreokcase, i  looked up and tried to take a picture but it just coninuted until a tree blocked my view and it was gone. i ran to my parents room (i was still in school) and told them i saw something flying in the sky, my mom replied in a sleepy way "thats nice" and went back to sleep
6. it dissappeared behind a tree, it was massive, i could see its brightness behind the first few trees. until it disspeared.
content.summary: Double triangle object, flying horizontally, extremely bright, huge, seen through window.
A ball of light in the sky, moving up,down, and side to side

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on a road going out of wendell, nc heading toward raleigh nc. saw a bright light moving slowly in the sky from the north. had no idea what it was. it was very bright light in sky, appeared round in shape moving slowly toward the south. it stopped in front and above us (no idea of the altitude). i stopped the car in the road and just sat there and looked at it. maybe 5 min. maybe more. not over 10 min. i am sure. the object then took off at a rate of speed toward the south/south at a rate of speed i had never seen before nor since. my friend and i were amazed more at the speed it left with than the object itself. we sat there only a few seconds after it left and continued driving west toward raleigh. i just remember how amazed i was at what i had just witnessed and my friend and i talked about it for most of the night. i have never witnessed anything like this since. although this was about 27 or 28 yrs. ago i will never forget it.  i would not believe in ufo's at all if i had not witnessed this myself
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw bright light in northern sky. moving south. stopped over us then took off towards south at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were driving home after running some errands when my son said, "hey, look dad, one of those things like i saw a couple of years ago". (he has seen these before!)
i looked over to my left and spotted a long bright silver object "hovering"/sitting motionless in the sky. we kept our eye(s) on it, and as we pulled over to the curb to get a better look, it disappeared. we both said at the same time, "where did it go?!"  my son has seen these same type ufos on 3 occasions, but on 2 of the occasions the ufo was manuevering; when we saw it together july 5th, it was "hovering". very bizarre and very frustrating to not be able to bet a better, longer look at it. we can't even estimate the distance or the altitude, since we have no frame of reference. there has been, and there is a lot of ongoing construction, commercial and residential, with a stretch of freeway just completed in roughly the area where we saw the ufo hovering. maybe they are wondering why all the activity?
content.summary: "cigar" shaped bright silver object spotted hovering over chandler, az

content.detailedDescription: It was appx. around 10:00 p.M.,when i was walking around the side of my friends apartment building,looked up and noticed the craft.I didnt know what to make of the object.The lights were very bright,and the colors of the lights were different than any color i'd ever seen before.When i first seen the object i thought that it was an airplane,but it didnt move or make a sound.The object was triangular in shape,that being with wide angles.Bright colored lights,motionless and soundless.I watched it for appx. 5 minutes,then went in to take my friends out to see the object,and it was no longer there.I then called the airport to see if they had any idea what it was,which they didnt.I also called the police dept.,they also had no reports of any such thing,of course no one believed me.Have there been any other incidents similar to this one?
content.summary: Large craft,triangular in shape,colored lights,didnt move,didnt make any noise
